ARABIC: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have they not looked at the earth and seen how We have made every sort of beneficial species grow in it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they not see the earth, how We grow all kinds of noble things upon it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they not look at the earth, how We caused a variety of fine vegetation to grow from it (in abundance)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they not seen the earth in which We have made gracious plants grow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Have they not seen the earth, that how many honourable pairs We have created in it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they not observe the earth -- how much of every good kind We cause to grow therein
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do they not see the earth, how many of every noble kind We have caused to grow in it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, have they not regarded the earth, how many therein We have caused to grow of every generous kind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have they not seen the earth, how much of every fruitful kind We make to grow therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they not see the earth, and what beneficial kinds of things We have caused to grow in it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Observe they not the earth, how much We make to grow therein of every fruitful kind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they not regarded the earth, how many of every splendid kind [of vegetation] We have caused to grow in it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they not observe the earth, how much of every good kind We cause to grow therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have they not seen the earth, how many We caused to grow in it every generous kind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have they not seen the earth, and how many beautiful pairs We produced therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:7] Have they not contemplated, observed, the earth, how many We have caused to grow therein, in other words, [We have caused to grow therein] many, of every splendid kind [of vegetation], [of every] fair species.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have they) the disbelievers of Mecca (not seen the earth, how much of every fruitful kind We make to grow therein?)
